mapper.select: select * from tyydemo1.user where Name like "%"#{Name}"%"
select * from tyydemo1.userinfo where Name like "%"#{Name}"%" limit 5
mapper.insert: insert into tyydemo1.relation (UserId, TargetId, RelationShip) values (#{UserId},#{TargetId},#{RelationShip});
insert into tyydemo1.phonecode (UserId, Code, Phone, Time) values (#{UserId},#{Code},#{Phone},#{Time});
mapper.select: select * from tyydemo1.phonecode where UserId = #{UserId} and Code = #{Code}
mapper.insert: insert into tyydemo1.friend (UserId, TargetId, Note, Photo, Signature, NowScenery) values (#{UserId},#{TargetId},#{Note},#{Photo},#{Signature},#{NowScenery});
mapper.select: select A.* from tyydemo1.articlecollect as AC,tyydemo1.article as A where AC.UserId = #{UserId} and AC.ArticleId = A.ArticleId
